<span id="jeweller"></span>
= Jeweller =

As a Jeweller, you will be able to sell unique versions of precious metals and decorations for special occasions. You can then sell these goods to players.

<div class="figure">

[[File:https://i.imgur.com/4H2efBq.png|Image]]

</div>
<span id="what-jewellers-do"></span>
== What Jewellers Do ==

Jewellers are skilled crafters when it comes to additional and decorative use for diamonds, gold, iron, and other ores. The following recipes can be exclusively crafted by a Jeweller:

{| class="wikitable"
|-
! Item
! Recipe
|-
| 24 Carat Diamond Ring
| [[File:https://i.imgur.com/SAj6JfX.png|24 Carat Diamond Ring]]
|-
| 14 Carat Diamond Ring
| [[File:https://i.imgur.com/ZSe24i7.png|14 Carat Diamond Ring]]
|-
| 24 Carat Gold Ring
| [[File:https://i.imgur.com/zwaHpOQ.png|24 Carat Gold Ring]]
|-
| 14 Carat Gold Ring
| [[File:https://i.imgur.com/jODr7qi.png|14 Carat Gold Ring]]
|-
| 24 Carat Silver Ring
| [[File:https://i.imgur.com/zaD1M9A.png|24 Carat Silver Ring]]
|-
| 14 Carat Silver Ring
| [[File:https://i.imgur.com/Wxbl25Z.png|14 Carat Silver Ring]]
|}

<span id="passed-the-exam-now-what"></span>
== Passed the Exam? Now What? ==

It is recommended that you purchase a plot and build a store, or rent a shop to sell your products in! Find available plots for sale/lease under #realty-adverts on our discord. As a Jeweller, you can also advertise your expertise in vehicles under #business-adverts.

To gather resources, you can either buy them from player shops or obtain them yourself in the wild. To get to the wild, type <code>/warp airport</code>. Right-click a monitor in the airport and choose out of 7 wild starting locations (pictured below).

<div class="figure">

[[File:https://i.imgur.com/HGY905O.png|Wild Starting Locations]]

</div>
(Check <code>/map</code> if you’re looking for a specific biome).
